data.name: Pluto
data.detailed_description:
Pluto is creating a new way for humanity to connect from anywhere in the world. Pluto enables natural, human, 3D communication while you're using virtual reality. It runs alongside SteamVR and other SteamVR apps for direct, contextual, and comfortable connections that go beyond text, voice, and even video.

With Pluto, you can call and chat with friends while in any SteamVR application. Spend time with trusted friends and contacts even when you’re not in the same physical (or virtual) location. Stay connected while using individual or multi-person apps.

To get started, (1) Download the Pluto app, (2) Create your own contacts list on Pluto, and (3) Stay connected to the people you know and trust who use VR.

  • Call and chat with existing contacts
  • Stay connected in private conversations while using individual or multi-person apps
  • Get into multiplayer games together. Try starting at the same time!
  • Talk with friends during loading screens and other slow app moments
  • Make art while connected to other people and share your Tilt Brush sketches (Requires Google Tilt Brush)
  • Use social VR apps while maintaining a separate conversation with one or several people
  • Access your contacts list and make connections through the Pluto Dashboard Overlay

data.short_description: Pluto is a communications service for people in VR. It’s designed to give you the feeling of hanging out in person, no matter where you are. Communicate, collaborate, and connect with trusted friends and contacts in 3D, even when you’re not in the same physical location.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
